channel.title: CVE Feed for Seiko Solutions Inc. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Seiko Solutions Inc. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-22361|2024-08-02T10:07:06.262Z -- seiko%20solutions%20inc. -- skybridge%20mb-a100%2F110
item.description: Improper privilege management vulnerability in SkyBridge MB-A100/110 firmware Ver. 4.2.0 and earlier allows a remote authenticated attacker to alter a WebUI password of the product.

item.title: CVE-2023-25072|2024-08-02T11:11:43.430Z -- seiko%20solutions%20inc. -- skybridge%20mb-a100%2F110
item.description: Use of weak credentials exists in SkyBridge MB-A100/110 firmware Ver. 4.2.0 and earlier, which may allow a remote unauthenticated attacker to decrypt password for the WebUI of the product.

item.title: CVE-2023-23906|2024-08-02T10:42:27.149Z -- seiko%20solutions%20inc. -- skybridge%20mb-a100%2F110
item.description: Missing authentication for critical function exists in SkyBridge MB-A100/110 firmware Ver. 4.2.0 and earlier, which may allow a remote unauthenticated attacker to execute some critical functions without authentication, e.g., rebooting the product.

item.title: CVE-2023-25070|2024-08-02T11:11:43.918Z -- seiko%20solutions%20inc. -- skybridge%20mb-a100%2F110
item.description: Cleartext transmission of sensitive information exists in SkyBridge MB-A100/110 firmware Ver. 4.2.0 and earlier. If the telnet connection is enabled, a remote unauthenticated attacker may eavesdrop on or alter the administrator's communication to the product.

item.title: CVE-2023-25184|2024-08-02T11:18:36.052Z -- seiko%20solutions%20inc. -- skybridge%20mb-a200%2C%20skybridge%20basic%20mb-a130%2C%20and%20skyspider%20mb-r210
item.description: Use of weak credentials exists in Seiko Solutions SkyBridge and SkySpider series, which may allow a remote unauthenticated attacker to decrypt password for the WebUI of the product. Affected products and versions are as follows: SkyBridge MB-A200 firmware Ver. 01.00.05 and earlier, SkyBridge BASIC MB-A130 firmware Ver. 1.4.1 and earlier, and SkySpider MB-R210 firmware Ver. 1.01.00 and earlier.

item.title: CVE-2023-23901|2024-08-02T10:42:27.068Z -- seiko%20solutions%20inc. -- skybridge%20mb-a200%20and%20skybridge%20basic%20mb-a130
item.description: Improper following of a certificate's chain of trust exists in SkyBridge MB-A200 firmware Ver. 01.00.05 and earlier, and SkyBridge BASIC MB-A130 firmware Ver. 1.4.1 and earlier, which may allow a remote unauthenticated attacker to eavesdrop on or alter the communication sent to the WebUI of the product.

item.title: CVE-2023-22441|2024-08-02T10:07:06.550Z -- seiko%20solutions%20inc. -- skybridge%20mb-a200%20and%20skybridge%20basic%20mb-a130
item.description: Missing authentication for critical function exists in Seiko Solutions SkyBridge series, which may allow a remote attacker to obtain or alter the setting information of the product or execute some critical functions without authentication, e.g., rebooting the product. Affected products and versions are as follows: SkyBridge MB-A200 firmware Ver. 01.00.05 and earlier, and SkyBridge BASIC MB-A130 firmware Ver. 1.4.1 and earlier

item.title: CVE-2023-23578|2024-08-02T10:35:33.394Z -- seiko%20solutions%20inc. -- skybridge%20mb-a200
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in SkyBridge MB-A200 firmware Ver. 01.00.05 and earlier allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to connect to the product's ADB port.

item.title: CVE-2023-24586|2024-08-02T11:03:18.788Z -- seiko%20solutions%20inc. -- skybridge%20mb-a100%2F110
item.description: Cleartext storage of sensitive information exists in SkyBridge MB-A100/110 firmware Ver. 4.2.0 and earlier, which may allow a remote authenticated attacker to obtain an APN credential for the product.

item.title: CVE-2024-32850|2024-08-02T02:20:35.662Z -- seiko%20solutions%20inc. -- skybridge%20mb-a100%2Fmb-a110
item.description: Improper neutralization of special elements used in a command ('Command Injection') exists in SkyBridge MB-A100/MB-A110 firmware Ver. 4.2.2 and earlier and SkyBridge BASIC MB-A130 firmware Ver. 1.5.5 and earlier. If the remote monitoring and control function is enabled on the product, an attacker with access to the product may execute an arbitrary command or login to the product with the administrator privilege.

item.title: CVE-2024-32850|2024-06-05T20:01:12.070Z -- seiko%20solutions%20inc. -- skybridge%20mb-a100%2Fmb-a110
item.description: Improper neutralization of special elements used in a command ('Command Injection') exists in SkyBridge MB-A100/MB-A110 firmware Ver. 4.2.2 and earlier and SkyBridge BASIC MB-A130 firmware Ver. 1.5.5 and earlier. If the remote monitoring and control function is enabled on the product, an attacker with access to the product may execute an arbitrary command or login to the product with the administrator privilege.
